column4: Allo, j'aimerais savoir s'il est possible de changer la methode du boot de Ubuntu... genre pour en mettre une differente comme ceux de KNOPPIX.. Est-ce possible ?
,u mean work off a live cd?

errr... Ubuntu got messedup .... It doesnt boot anymore for me :( ... onl thing i remmber is that i deleted one of my FAT32 partitions from within Windows :( and since then Ubuntu loads up (according to the loaderbar.. but the login windows never comes up.... and Ctrl + alt + F1 ... etc doesnt do anything ..
no I want the boot like these of KNOPPIX... http://tyge.sslug.dk/knoppix/knx5/01-knoppix-boot-process.png
